Workflow.name: Lifecycle Event - Deprovision Accounts

Variable.initializer: rule:Account Provisioning - Parse Application Deprovisioning Policies
Variable.name: accountDeprovisioningMap
userName
Variable.Description: The display name of the identity.

Workflow.Description: Disable all user accounts when an employee leaves the company. Send email notifications to the person's Manager and to any Application Owners of non-authoritative Applications. In other words, there is no reason to alert the HR team, since they triggered this event in the first place.
